bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Underground Type, Self-Cooled, Single-Phase, Distribution Transformers with Separable Insulated High-Voltage Connectors; High Voltage 25000 V and Below; Low Voltage 600 V and Below; 167 kVA and Smaller

IEEE Standard for Underground Type, Self-Cooled, Single-Phase, Distribution Transformers with Separable Insulated High-Voltage Connectors; High Voltage 25000 V and Below; Low Voltage 600 V and Below; 167 kVA and Smaller
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.23-2002 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.23-1992)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Electrical, dimensional, and mechanical characteristics and certain safety features of single-phase, 60 Hz, mineral-oil-immersed, self-cooled, distribution transformers with separable insulated high-voltage connectors are covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.12.23-2009 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.23-2002)
